name: Squares N' Guns
description: It's simple right now, your a square, and you kill other squares, Q and E show/hide the other square, 1-3 for guns, 4 is push, 5 is grab, G is grenade, and R is reset(Highly recommend that you do this when you start so the grabbing isn't bugged). Have fun, and remember, the are bugs, which are exploitable. I partially intended that.
